attributes.action: Take action to address the humanitarian crisis in Syria
attributes.additional_details:
This petition follows on from a recent petition "Air-drop life-saving aid into the starving cities in Syria." "https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/173574

Although there was no debate on the above petition the response stated that "the Committee would, however, look favourably on future petitions calling for action to address the humanitarian crisis in Syria, if they have substantial public support."
attributes.background: This petition has been created to ask for public support for a Parliamentary debate on how the UK can help to address the humanitarian crisis in Syria.
